column5: Does anyone have info on these two lakes? I have heard that they are excellent pike and walleye lakes but wondered if anyone had first hand experience. Fish on!!

I have fished Esnagami for the past 6 to 7 years, and with the fishing that it offers and the hospitality that Eric offers at the lodge, I really have no desire to go anywhere else. You can check out information on Esnagami at "esnagami.com"

Read with Pleasure, My 14 yr. old and I are headed into Nakina to visit Eric and Esnagami this week. We leave early Fri. morning to make 8 AM plane on Saturday. Met Eric at the Sport Show in Cleveland and happily saw the photos of what is in store for us, mother nature willing, of course. Esnagami is first class all the was, visit web site at Esnagami.com
Jim,How did you and your son do on Esnagami? Been there twice, just wondering.
